main_definition: A word used in comparisons to show difference between two things.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a conjunction for making comparisons between two objects, actions or states.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is taller than her brother.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to introduce examples or illustrations that are less important or relevant in the context of comparison.
meanings_and_examples.example: He speaks English fluently, not just well but exceptionally well, than his peers who only studied for a year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used when discussing quantities to indicate which is greater between two amounts or measurements.
meanings_and_examples.example: The store sold more apples than bananas this week.
